doc:
Jim Hutton https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jim_Hutton 0 Dana James Hutton (May 31, 1934 – June 2, 1979) was an American actor in film and television best remembered for his role as Ellery Queen in the 1970s TV series of the same name and his screen partnership with Paula Prentiss in four films, starting with Where the Boys Are. He is the father of actor Timothy Hutton. Dana_James_Hutton ( May_31_,_1934 – June_2_,_1979 ) was an_American_actor in film_and_television_best remembered for his_role as Ellery_Queen in the_1970s_TV_series of the_same_name and his_screen_partnership with Paula_Prentiss in four_films , starting with Where the_Boys Are . He is the_father of actor_Timothy_Hutton .
